dmca.title: Withdrawal of DMCA (Copyright) Complaint to Google

android_app_name_1: DataVault Password Manager
companyname: Ascendo Inc.
country_residence: US
dmca_clarifications: Our application was removed from the Android Market  
following a complaint from Citibank. We have worked with the plaintif to  
resolve the issue and corrected the application in a satisfactory way. The  
plaintif sent the email below to removals@google.com which is an unread  
autoresponder.

Can you please instruct us on how to load the compliant version of our  
application or let us know if further action is needed?

Best regards,
Marc Bolh

-----Original Message-----
From: Keller, Stacey Berg [mailto:kellerst@citi.com]
Sent: Friday, January 20, 2012 5:59 PM
To: 'The Android Market Team' (removals@google.com)
Cc: 'Marc Bolh'
Subject: [#944528605] Your Request to Google

Dear Google Team,

Thank you very much for your cooperation in removing the DataVault Password  
Manager mobile application from Android Market on Friday, January 13, 2012,  
further to Citigroup Inc.'s Trademark Complaint (see below) about the  
application for its unauthorized use of our CITI and CITI and Arc Design  
marks.

Immediately after the mobile application was removed, its developer Ascendo  
Inc. (copied hereto) contacted us to communicate its willingness to  
cooperate with us on the removal of all unauthorized Citigroup Inc. marks  
from its products, services, and website.  We have reached an agreement  
satisfactory to both parties, and Ascendo Inc. has created a version of its  
application, DataVault Password Manager, for Android Market that complies  
with our agreement.  Given Ascendo Inc.'s compliance and efforts to  
eliminate all unauthorized uses of the Citigroup Inc. marks, we are writing  
to request that Google permit Ascendo Inc. to upload the modified version  
of its application, DataVault Password Manager, to the Android Market.

Please contact me should you wish to discuss this matter.  Thank you again  
for your cooperation.


Regards,

Stacey Berg Keller
Assistant General Counsel
Citigroup Inc.
O&T and IP Law Group
One Court Square
45th Floor
Long Island City, NY 11120
phone: 718-248-4032
fax: 718-248-2716
kellerst@citi.com
